attributes.action: Standardize all state school term time holidays
attributes.additional_details: My name is Gemma I'm a mum of two boys employed as a teacher . I find it very difficult to manage childcare during the holidays when my boys are on term time holidays and I'm still working in another school for a different local authority. most mums I speak too are struggling to They suffer financially and miss not being at home with their children planning holidays and spending quality time with them. the last debate was 2015 we have moved forward since then please  sign and support my petition
attributes.background: My name is Gemma I'm a mum of two boys employed as a teacher and run my own business. I find it very difficult to manage childcare during the holidays when my boys are on term time holidays and I'm still working in another school for a different local authority.
